title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 26 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 26 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Judge me, O LORD; for I have walked in mine integrity: I have trusted also in the LORD; therefore I shall not slide.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你为我伸冤，因我向来行事纯全，我又倚靠耶和华并不摇动。

lineList.en: Examine me, O LORD, and prove me; try my reins and my heart.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你察看我，试验我，熬炼我的肺腑心肠。

lineList.en: For thy lovingkindness is before mine eyes: and I have walked in thy truth.
lineList.cn: 因为你的慈爱常在我眼前。我也按你的真理而行。

lineList.en: I have not sat with vain persons, neither will I go in with dissemblers.
lineList.cn: 我没有和虚谎人同坐。也不与瞒哄人同群。

lineList.en: I have hated the congregation of evil doers; and will not sit with the wicked.
lineList.cn: 我恨恶恶人的会，必不与恶人同坐。

lineList.en: I will wash mine hands in innocency: so will I compass thine altar, O LORD:
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，我要洗手表明无辜，才环绕你的祭坛。

lineList.en: That I may publish with the voice of thanksgiving, and tell of all thy wondrous works.
lineList.cn: 我好发称谢的声音。也要述说你一切奇妙的作为。

lineList.en: LORD, I have loved the habitation of thy house, and the place where thine honour dwelleth.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，我喜爱你所住的殿，和你显荣耀的居所。

lineList.en: Gather not my soul with sinners, nor my life with bloody men:
lineList.cn: 不要把我的灵魂和罪人一同除掉，不要把我的性命和流人血的一同除掉。

lineList.en: In whose hands is mischief, and their right hand is full of bribes.
lineList.cn: 他们的手中有奸恶，右手满有贿赂。

lineList.en: But as for me, I will walk in mine integrity: redeem me, and be merciful unto me.
lineList.cn: 至于我，却要行事纯全。求你救赎我，怜恤我。

lineList.en: My foot standeth in an even place: in the congregations will I bless the LORD.
lineList.cn: 我的脚站在平坦地方。在众会中我要称颂耶和华。
